title: How to Make Elephant Ears in a Microwave

steps.headline: Cut one tortilla into multiple (thick) strips.
Place the tortilla strips on a microwaveable plate.
Rub butter generously over one side of the strips.
steps.description: To make it easier, you can butter before cutting into strips!

steps.headline: Place the plate of strips in the microwave.
steps.description: Microwave on high for two and a half minutes.

steps.headline: Sprinkle generously with cinnamon and sugar.

text: Cut one tortilla into multiple (thick) strips.  Place the tortilla strips on a microwaveable plate.  Rub butter generously over one side of the strips. To make it easier, you can butter before cutting into strips! Place the plate of strips in the microwave. Microwave on high for two and a half minutes. Sprinkle generously with cinnamon and sugar. Serve immediately.
